attributes.action: New Year’s Honours 2021 should comprise solely of heroes during the pandemic.
attributes.additional_details: It is the unsung heroes who have helped, and are continuing to help, their fellow citizens cope with, and get through the pandemic. They do not seek public recognition, and are selfless in their endeavours.
attributes.background: Ensure the 2021 New Years Honours list exclusively rewards members of the public who have been heroes during the pandemic. It should exclude rich, famous and political appointees.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept petitions about honours or appointments. The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/

There is a separate form for nominating someone for an honour for coronavirus-related work: https://www.gov.uk/honours/nominate-someone-for-coronavirus-work
